snippet.title: Realm Of I - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Realm Of I can be wishlisted here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2726810/Realm_Of_I/
"Realm Of I is a side-scrolling Metroidvania where you take the role of a prophet. Explore the ravaged landscapes—from settlements and caverns to vibrant ecosystems and floating islands—uncovering newfound abilities, spells, and talismans to conquer challenges, defeat foes, and solve quests." (- Steam description)

Join the Discord if you're interested; https://discord.com/invite/AENsDrBKhQ
